mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (login_id, username, email, password_hash, role_code, status_code, profile_image, phone_number, address, birth_date, gender_code, join_date, last_login) VALUES (#{loginId}, #{username}, #{email}, #{passwordHash}, #{roleCode}, #{statusCode}, #{profileImage}, #{phoneNumber}, #{address}, #{birthDate}, #{genderCode}, #{joinDate}, #{lastLogin})
